snippet: The United States should ratify a global treaty to keep weapons out of the wrong hands.
abstract: Editorial calls on United States and other member nations to immediately ratify United Nations arms trade treaty; holds it will significantly boost control of world's $70 billion global market in conventional weapons; contends National Rifle Association's opposition is fear-mongering effort entirely without merit.
lead_paragraph: The United States should ratify a global treaty to keep weapons out of the wrong hands.
